item.title: About me
item.author: architect@datahubstudio.com (The Simple Architect)
item.description:
Education:

  • M.S, Computer Science –Sacred Heart University (May, 2001)
  • B.S, Software Engineering –UTN (January, 1995)
  • A.S, Physics –NCTC (January, 1997)

Work Experience:

My name is Daniel Càceres a seasoned Data Architect with 12+ years of experience architecting scalable, cloud-native data solutions. Expert in designing real-time data pipelines, implementing data governance frameworks, and leveraging AI/ML for predictive analytics. Spearheaded a data modernization initiative that reduced data processing time by 80% and increased data accuracy by 25%. Adept at leading cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, business-driven data strategies.
